alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Itasca, northwestern Aitkin, northeastern Cass and southeastern Koochiching Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Margie, to near Oslund, to near Bena, to 6 miles northwest of Longville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ball Club and Margie around 335 AM CDT. Deer River, Bigfork, Zemple and Days High Landing around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Remer, Cohasset, Pokegama Dam, Grand Rapids, Coleraine and Gunn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
